name: EndSoldier: Brave eLite Unit
description:
You are a Brave eLite Unit (B.L.U.) operative. You've been diagnosed with an incurable fatal condition, but wish to see your family thrive after your death. You therefore accept a mission to be dropped into Radical Evil Doer Detachment (R.E.D.D.) territory and kill as many of the enemy as possible.

Do your best, serve B.L.U., and your family will be compensated greatly!

This game is in development, there's all kinds of problems with it. But feel free to tear it to pieces. I'm putting it up here for feedback so throw it all at me.
